titles.title: Social Security Disability Insurance Demonstration Authority Act of 2008

To amend title II of the Social Security Act reestablish the Social Security Administration's experiment and demonstration project authority regarding the Social Security Disability Insurance Program, and for other purposes.
Social Security Disability Insurance Demonstration Authority Act of 2008

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Social Security Disability Insurance Demonstration Authority Act of 2008 - Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) (OASDI) of the Social Security Act to reestablish the Social Security Administration's disability insurance demonstration project authority.
